name: Arrow Swipe Arcade
description:
Swipe the black arrow in the same direction and swipe the striped arrow in the opposite direction.

Sounds very easy doesn't it?? Try 'Arrow Swipe Arcade' now and challenge yourself!!

FEATURES:
- Three game modes: Arcade, Race and Time attack;
- Share your score with friends and family on the Game Centre Leaderboards, Facebook or Twitter;
- Simple yet stunning graphics; and
